title: Championship/Victorious Skin Speculation
body: So we're getting to that time of year when we see which teams will be going to worlds, which teams will be going home, and most importantly which champions are most likely going to be getting skins. For example last year, we had 2 ADC skins because both Sivir and Kalista were very important in the Solo Queue and Professional scenes. So based on which champions have been very defined in the meta this year so far, who do you guys, the community, think the new "Victorious" and "Championship" skins will be for.

replies.body: Bard, because then we can get the worlds theme played by bard.

Oh my, I didn't realize how awesome such a thing could be.
I need it now.

Viktorious Viktor.

Do it for the Pun's sake
V for Viktorious Viktor. No srsly dude you're influential, vote yorick for victorious skin
I have a feeling all signs points to Karma for victorious.
Agreed, she's been a pretty contended pick this season.
victorious azir? that would be fun

I super want to see Championship Anivia, but it probably won't happen due to her already having a blue color scheme on her base skin and Blackfrost (1820 RP)  skin.

If we're going based on seasonal prevalence for championship, I have a few ideas for each lane of what could be an option.

* Top - Maokai, Fiora
* Jungle - Rek'Sai
* Mid - Cassiopeia
* Bot - Lucian
* Support - Karma, Soraka

My bet goes on Cass just because of the prevalence of MYMU. I have no idea for Victorious skins, but again I vote Cass for if she doesn't get the Championship skin this year. I feel like Azir would be a good pick for both Championship or Victorious skins. I just don't think he'll get it between Riot already working on the SKT skin for him (I know esports skins aren't supposed to count for priority but the skins team IS human and will have bias.)

EDIT: formatting
Im guessing between Kindred, Viktor, Azir, and maybe Vladimir.
There are no words for what a gigantic service it would be for Noxus fans if Victorious Swain becomes reality.
